tasks.task: Consult with a university extension agent about transitioning to a beef cow-calf operation.
subtasks: Research compost bedded pack barn facilities.
Consider the benefits of improved animal comfort and reduced mud exposure.
Assess the impact of animal rest on stress levels.
Evaluate the feasibility of implementing a similar facility for beef cows.

tasks.task: Design and construct a compost bedded pack barn for cattle.
subtasks: Determine the appropriate size and capacity for the facility.
Source and prepare the bedding material (e.g., sawdust).
Install proper ventilation and lighting systems.
Ensure safe access for feed delivery and regular sanitation.

tasks.task: Convert part-time dairy facilities to a beef cow-calf operation.
subtasks: Transition management practices from previous dairy experience.
Identify genetic and quality breeding goals.
Adapt winter feeding strategies for hay and grain.
Monitor animal performance and adjust feeding as needed.

tasks.task: Optimize farm facility management for off-farm workers.
subtasks: Schedule regular farm visits despite limited time.
Maintain visual check on animal welfare daily.
Balance labor input between facility management and off-farm employment.

tasks.task: Monitor pasture recovery during barn confinement.
subtasks: Plan the rotation of livestock between pasture and barn.
Assess pasture condition and health prior to reintroduction.
Adjust grazing practices based on pasture regrowth.
